scripts.compile: riot src/tag tmp.tag.js --type coffeescript; css2js --css=node_modules/datatables/media/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css --out=tmp.datatables.css.js --template=vanilla_runner; cat tmp.datatables.css.js node_modules/datatables/media/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js tmp.tag.js | uglifyjs -o riot-datagrid.min.js; rm tmp.*
